title: Берия. Проигрыш
overview: In the film dedicated to Lavrenty Beria, the circumstances of the arrest of Beria on June 26, 1953 are restored in detail. It tells about the meeting of the Presidium, from which Beria was taken away in handcuffs, about the last months of his life spent in prison and his shooting on December 23, 1953.
